column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This is merely speculation
column2: but I am pretty sure our pizza was frozen. We ordered a sausage
column5: and green pepper pie. Our server said it would take extra time to cook with the extras on it. We didn't care. (We're wild and crazy) When our pizza arrived the pepperoni
column7: and peppers were cooked on top and the sausage inside. The sausage itself was one thin patty and the diameter of the pizza. It was weird
